short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture audio from meetings and control recording via a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension of the Deducta Platform this Chrome Extension is used to capture meeting audio, transcribe and post into your Deducta Agents for summaries, data retrieval etc.

Used by large organisations for meetings both in person and online.
